transaction-number.description: A Bitcoin transaction number in a sequence of transactions

value_BTC.description: Value in BTC at date/time displayed in field 'time'

value_EUR.description: Value in EUR with conversion rate as of date/time displayed in field 'time'

value_USD.description: Value in USD with conversion rate as of date/time displayed in field 'time'

description: An object to describe a Bitcoin transaction. Best to be used with bitcoin-wallet.
name: btc-transaction
